2099160.name: Jam Scrapz Collection - Abyss Rush
2099160.description:
How far can your rocket reach the center of the earth without crashing?
Find out in this quick, classic, mono-level, arcade simulator game.

A quick and addictive arcade classic where you dive into the abyss, reaching as far as you can towards the deepest depths, and through the other side.
Score as much points as you can, post it on the leaderboards for bragging rights.

_

This DLC is automatically bundled with JSC, however you can buy this standalone version individually here if you don't wish to buy the entire collection.
